titleStmt.title: By the King and Queen, a proclamation
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Starkey and Awnsham Churchill,

notesStmt.note: "Given at Our Court at Whitehall, this 14th day of February 1688 [i.e. 1689], in the first year of Our reign."
Text begins: "Forasmuch as it hath pleased God to call us to the throne and that thereby it is incumbent upon us to prevent any inconvenience to our subjects ..."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
